description.plain:
Dove Cameron is an American singer and actress best known for portraying both title characters on Disney Channel’s Liv & Maddie and the daughter of Maleficent in Disney’s Descendants franchise. She was born Chloe Celeste Hosterman on January 15th, 1996 and exhibited a love for music and acting from a young age. She changed her name to Dove as a tribute to her father when he died, as it was his nickname for her.

Dove’s big break came when she was cast as Alanna for the Disney Channel pilot Bits and Pieces, which was scrapped. The show was changed into Liv & Maddie and Dove was cast as the titular twins. She admitted to Playbill in November 2016 that she almost quit the show due to the amount of work and the fact that having one actress play two TV characters had never been done before. However, she stuck it out and rose to stardom.

Dove soon landed the leading role in Disney’s 2015 film Descendants, a story about the children of notorious fairytale villains and their internal conflict of whether to follow in their parents' footsteps to evil or choose their own future. Shortly after its premiere, it was named the fifth most-watched cable movie of all time, and a sequel was announced at a Disneyland Descendants event in October 2015.  Dove reprised her role in 2017’s Descendants 2, which drew in an audience of over 20 million people during its premiere across six networks.

Aside from acting, Dove was in a band called The Girl and the Dreamcatcher with then-boyfriend/fiancé Ryan McCartan, but the project fell apart once the two broke up. Dove is now focusing on her solo music career.

On September 27, 2019, Dove released her debut EP, Bloodshot / Waste. She released 4 more songs: So Good, Out of Touch, Remember Me feat. BIA, and most recently We Belong.

Dove Cameron is an American singer and actress best known for portraying both title characters on Disney Channel’s Liv & Maddie and the daughter of Maleficent in Disney’s Descendants franchise. She was born Chloe Celeste Hosterman on January 15th, 1996 and exhibited a love for music and acting from a young age. She changed her name to Dove as a tribute to her father when he died, as it was his nickname for her.

Dove’s big break came when she was cast as Alanna for the Disney Channel pilot Bits and Pieces, which was scrapped. The show was changed into Liv & Maddie and Dove was cast as the titular twins. She admitted to Playbill in November 2016 that she almost quit the show due to the amount of work and the fact that having one actress play two TV characters had never been done before. However, she stuck it out and rose to stardom.

Dove soon landed the leading role in Disney’s 2015 film Descendants, a story about the children of notorious fairytale villains and their internal conflict of whether to follow in their parents' footsteps to evil or choose their own future. Shortly after its premiere, it was named the fifth most-watched cable movie of all time, and a sequel was announced at a Disneyland Descendants event in October 2015.  Dove reprised her role in 2017’s Descendants 2, which drew in an audience of over 20 million people during its premiere across six networks.

Aside from acting, Dove was in a band called The Girl and the Dreamcatcher with then-boyfriend/fiancé Ryan McCartan, but the project fell apart once the two broke up. Dove is now focusing on her solo music career.

On September 27, 2019, Dove released her debut EP, Bloodshot / Waste. She released 4 more songs: So Good, Out of Touch, Remember Me feat. BIA, and most recently We Belong.

songs.title: Boyfriend

description.plain:
“Boyfriend” is the lead single to Dove Cameron’s untitled debut album. The song was originally not planned to be released in February until it later started drawing attraction on TikTok through one of her posts, which garnered over five million likes. Through her Instagram, Dove later announced the song would be released on February 11, 2022. She has stated that

In writing ‘Boyfriend,’ I feel like I finally found my sound, my perspective and myself in a way I wasn’t sure I ever would,” she said in a press release. “I am so immensely happy to have this song and this part of me out in the world. I hope you feel access to yourself when you listen to it too.”

Highlighting her queerness, “Boyfriend” emphasizes the speaker telling the object of their affection just how much better a partner they’d be than their current boyfriend. As in, maybe what the girl in question needs… is a girlfriend.

songs.embed_content: Read “Boyfriend” by Dove Cameron on Genius

I can't believe we're finally alone

And he's not with you (Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm)

What am I gonna do? Not grab your wrist?

I could do the shit that he never did

I could be such a gentleman
Plus, all my clothes would fit

I could be a better boyfriend

All the ways hе can't suffice
If I could give you some advicе
I would leave with me tonight

Ladies first, baby, I insist

For someone else to take you home

songs.title: If Only

description.plain:
“If Only” is a song from the Disney Channel Original Movie Descendants. The song is performed by Dove Cameron who plays Mal, the daughter of Maleficent.

When the song is featured in the movie, Mal is on a date with Prince Ben, the son of Belle and the Beast, who she put a love spell on. She originally put the spell on him so she could steal the Fairy Godmother’s wand like her mother wanted, but she starts to enjoy spending so much time with Ben. However, she can’t tell if she is in love because she has never felt love before.

songs.embed_content: Read “If Only” by Dove Cameron on Genius

album.full_title: Descendants (Original TV Movie Soundtrack) by Walt Disney Records

54 ContributorsTranslationsPortuguêsIf Only Lyrics[Verse 1]
A million thoughts in my head
Should I let my heart keep listening?
'Cause up 'til now I've walked the line
Nothing lost but something missing

Which way should I go?

If only I knew what my heart was telling me
Don't know what I'm feeling, is this just a dream?
Ah-oh, yeah
If only I could read the signs in front of me
I could find the way to who I'm meant to be
Ah-oh, if only
If only

To something new, something brave

[Chorus]

songs.full_title: My Once Upon a Time by Dove Cameron
songs.title: My Once Upon a Time

description.plain: “My Once Upon a Time” is a soaring Broadway-style ballad where Mal comes to terms with her wrong actions throughout Descendants 3 and takes personal responsibility for them, rather than blaming her upbringing. She asserts she will take charge of her narrative to change her story.

songs.lyrics:
41 ContributorsMy Once Upon a Time Lyrics[Verse 1]
Here you are alone, and you deserve it
Your friends have turned to stone
And that's on you
You had a cause to serve but did you serve it?
Or did you see yourself in a way that wasn't true?

[Pre-Chorus 1]
This is not your father's fairytale
And no, it's not your mother's fault you fail
So when your story comes to light
Make sure the story that they write
[Chorus 1]
Goes once upon a time a girl tried harder
Once upon a time she tried again
Once upon a braver choice
She took a risk
She used her voice
And that will be my once upon a time
This time

[Verse 2]
Why tell all those lies?
You feel unworthy
Like there isn't solid ground for you to stand
But a stack of lies is not a firm foundation
You cannot build a castle on a mountain made of sand

[Pre-Chorus 2]
This is not your mother's dark desire
And no, it's not your father's hair on fire
Turns out it's you who's not awake
So if there's change you wanna make

[Chorus 2]
Take once upon a time she fought a dragon
Once upon a time that beast was me
Once upon a misspent youth
She faced herself
She spoke the truth
That's how I see my once upon a time
This time
You might also like[Verse 3]
Life is not a storybook but life unfolds in chapters
Turn the page and start to make amends
There's no pre-written guarantee of "Happily ever after"
Step into your greatness before your story ends
So when your story ends

[Chorus 3]
They'll say once upon a time a girl flew higher
Once upon a time she made things right
Once upon a tie that binds
She changed her heart
To change their minds
That's got to be my once upon a time

[Outro]
This once upon a time
I'll finally see my once upon a time
This time1Embed
